verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G1096><s%> false prophets <S%G5578><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> false teachers <S%G5572><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> privily shall bring in <S%G3919><s%> damnable <S%G684><s%> heresies <S%G139><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> the Lord <S%G1203><s%> that bought <S%G59><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and bring <S%G1863><s%> upon themselves <S%G1438><s%> swift <S%G5031><s%> destruction <S%G684><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall follow <S%G1811><s%> their <S%G846><s%> pernicious ways <S%G684><s%>; by reason of <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%> shall be evil spoken of <S%G987><s%>. pernicious ways: or, lascivious ways, as some copies read

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> spared <S%G5339><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> that sinned <S%G264><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> cast them down to hell <S%G5020><s%>, and delivered <S%G3860><s%> them into chains <S%G4577><s%> of darkness <S%G2217><s%>, to be reserved <S%G5083><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> spared <S%G5339><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the old <S%G744><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> saved <S%G5442><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> the eighth <S%G3590><s%> person, a preacher <S%G2783><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, bringing in <S%G1863><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> upon the world <S%G2889><s%> of the ungodly <S%G765><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> turning <S%G5077><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrha <S%G1116><s%> into ashes <S%G5077><s%> condemned <S%G2632><s%> them with an overthrow <S%G2692><s%>, making <S%G5087><s%> them an ensample <S%G5262><s%> unto those that after should <S%G3195><s%> live ungodly <S%G764><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> just <S%G1342><s%> Lot <S%G3091><s%>, vexed <S%G2669><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the filthy <S%G766><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> the wicked <S%G113><s%>:

(For <S%G1063><s%> that righteous man <S%G1342><s%> dwelling <S%G1460><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, in seeing <S%G990><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G189><s%>, vexed <S%G928><s%> his righteous <S%G1342><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> from day <S%G2250><s%> to <S%G1537><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> with their unlawful <S%G459><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>;)

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%> how to deliver <S%G4506><s%> the godly <S%G2152><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> temptations <S%G3986><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> to reserve <S%G5083><s%> the unjust <S%G94><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%> to be punished <S%G2849><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> chiefly <S%G3122><s%> them that walk <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of uncleanness <S%G3394><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> government <S%G2963><s%>. Presumptuous <S%G5113><s%> are they, selfwilled <S%G829><s%>, they are not <S%G3756><s%> afraid <S%G5141><s%> to speak evil <S%G987><s%> of dignities <S%G1391><s%>. government: or, dominion

Whereas <S%G3699><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, which are <S%G5607><s%> greater in <S%G3187><s%> power <S%G2479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> might <S%G1411><s%>, bring <S%G5342><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> railing <S%G989><s%> accusation <S%G2920><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them <S%G846><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. them: some read, themselves

But <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> natural <S%G5446><s%> brute <S%G249><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%>, made <S%G1080><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be taken <S%G259><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed <S%G5356><s%>, speak evil <S%G987><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> the things that <S%G3739><s%> they understand not <S%G50><s%>; and shall utterly perish <S%G2704><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> corruption <S%G5356><s%>;

And shall receive <S%G2865><s%> the reward <S%G3408><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>, as they that count <S%G2233><s%> it pleasure <S%G2237><s%> to riot <S%G5172><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day time <S%G2250><s%>. Spots <S%G4696><s%> they are and <S%G2532><s%> blemishes <S%G3470><s%>, sporting themselves <S%G1792><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> deceivings <S%G539><s%> while they feast <S%G4910><s%> with you <S%G5213><s%>;

Having <S%G2192><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of adultery <S%G3428><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that cannot cease from <S%G180><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>; beguiling <S%G1185><s%> unstable <S%G793><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>: an heart <S%G2588><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> exercised <S%G1128><s%> with covetous practices <S%G4124><s%>; cursed <S%G2671><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>: adultery: Gr. an adulteress

Which have forsaken <S%G2641><s%> the right <S%G2117><s%> way <S%G3598><s%>, and are gone astray <S%G4105><s%>, following <S%G1811><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> the son of Bosor <S%G1007><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the wages <S%G3408><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2192><s%> rebuked <S%G1649><s%> for his <S%G2398><s%> iniquity <S%G3892><s%>: the dumb <S%G880><s%> ass <S%G5268><s%> speaking <S%G5350><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> forbad <S%G2967><s%> the madness <S%G3913><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> wells <S%G4077><s%> without water <S%G504><s%>, clouds <S%G3507><s%> that are carried <S%G1643><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> a tempest <S%G2978><s%>; to whom <S%G3739><s%> the mist <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> is reserved <S%G5083><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when they speak <S%G5350><s%> great swelling <S%G5246><s%> words of vanity <S%G3153><s%>, they allure <S%G1185><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, through much wantonness <S%G766><s%>, those that were clean <S%G3689><s%> escaped <S%G668><s%> from them who live <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> error <S%G4106><s%>. clean: or, for a little, or, a while, as some read

While they promise <S%G1861><s%> them <S%G846><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%>, they themselves <S%G846><s%> are <S%G5225><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of corruption <S%G5356><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> is overcome <S%G2274><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> of the same <S%G5129><s%> is he brought in bondage <S%G1402><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> after they have escaped <S%G668><s%> the pollutions <S%G3393><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, they are <S%G1707><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> entangled <S%G1707><s%> therein <S%G5125><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> overcome <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2274><s%>, the latter end <S%G2078><s%> is worse <S%G5501><s%> with them <S%G846><s%> than the beginning <S%G4413><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it had been <S%G2258><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> for them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to have known <S%G1921><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%>, after they have known <S%G1921><s%> it, to turn <S%G1994><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> it is happened <S%G4819><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> according to <S%G3588><s%> the true <S%G227><s%> proverb <S%G3942><s%>, The dog <S%G2965><s%> is turned <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> vomit <S%G1829><s%> again <S%G1994><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sow <S%G5300><s%> that was washed <S%G3068><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> her wallowing <S%G2946><s%> in the mire <S%G1004><s%>.
